creator: 1983-01-06@gmx.net
text:
Created attachment 34420
Patch for TomcatCSS#TOMCAT_CSS

Several small, non-content, improvements to the TOMCAT_CSS:

* Add Missing spaces
* Use lowercase element names
* Uniform style of key-value data

Patch has been created against Tomcat 8.5.x trunk.

Hi,

Thanks for the report and the patch.
This has been fixed in
- 9.0.x for 9.0.0.M14 onwards and
- 8.5.x for 8.5.9 onwards

Regards,
Violeta
creator: violetagg@apache.org
